1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, Yajaw ach bay satcan, chin aj t'anan en yet ay tzet chi yochej in c'ul.</t>
2: <t>Mamin, chon oc t'anan en axca wal yoc t'anan nak mosejal yin is patrón, ma axca wal yoc t'anan ix criada yin xal patronej. Lanan co makon yok' a c'ul jin, ach co Diosal.</t>
3: <t>Ok' wal a c'ul jin on Mamin, ok' wal a c'ul jin xin, tol c'amxa chi techaj juj on, bay chon intaknelay elok.</t>
4: <t>Tol yin miman yailal ayon ec' yuj is buchwal eb beyom, c'al bay chon yintaknej el eb ch'aan chi yut ba.</t>
